title: Berkshire was a net seller of stocks in Buffett's final quarter as CEO
summary_full: During Warren Buffett's last quarter as CEO, Berkshire Hathaway sold more equities than it bought, continuing to whittle away at its big Apple and Bank of America stakes and slashing its already modest Amazon.com holding.
